title: BRIEF-GTT To Acquire Interoute For About EUR 1.9 Billion
text: February 26, 2018 / 3:13 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-GTT To Acquire Interoute For About EUR 1.9 Billion Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - GTT Communications Inc: * GTT TO ACQUIRE INTEROUTE * GTT COMMUNICATIONS INC - DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY EUR 1.9 BILLION ($2.3 BILLION) IN CASH. * GTT COMMUNICATIONS INC - ‍PURCHASE PRICE WILL BE PAID IN CASH AT CLOSING​ * GTT COMMUNICATIONS INC - ‍ RECEIVED COMMITTED DEBT FINANCING FOR DEAL FROM A GROUP OF FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS * GTT - ‍ RECEIVED COMMITTED EQUITY FINANCING OF $250 MILLION FROM CO‘S LARGEST INSTITUTIONAL INVESTOR SPRUCE HOUSE PARTNERSHIP & ACACIA PARTNERS​ * GTT COMMUNICATIONS INC - ‍AFTER CLOSING, EXPECTS TO REDUCE RATIO OF TOTAL NET DEBT TO ADJUSTED EBITDA TO ITS LONG-TERM TARGET RANGE OF 3.0-4.0:1​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
